description: This position carries all the responsibilities of my previous position, and the extra responsibilities of; Coordinating and implementing staff training.  Planning and managing the restaurant.  Seating and greeting guests and ensuring their needs are met.

My new duties where to shadow the owner on reception so as to help increase my understanding, that would lead me to increasing occupancy.  This would involve learning the new online booking system so that I could be responisble for it when the manager finishes her shift.  Another responsibility I was given was to order wet stock for the bar, and to maintain the bar area and cellar to a high standard.

I was employed originally on a trial basis at the Shard Riverside Inn then I was transferred to a full-time position at their sister hotel at The Mill at Condor Green. The team included six members of staff.
